Bernie Sanders said Barack Obama should have expected Erskine Bowles and Alan Simpson would recommend raising the retirement age.`` That wasn't an accident,'' he said. When you appoint people, you know what you're going to get. The commission issued a final proposal in December that called for increasing the retirement age to 68 by 2050 and to 69 by 2075.
